channel.title: Moparscape v3.2 Webclient
channel.description:
This might seem stupid but do I just put in random name? I checked the Mopar Server Status Checker so do I just put in the server name? or do I put a servername then port or something? I'm really confused... someone help. Do I have to download the Moparscape client or something?
Thanks for help./

item.title: Moparscape v3.2 Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Typh Typh
item.description:
@Typh wrote:

Just do this:

Username: Just type anything in you will remember
Password: Same as above
Server IP: Just put the ip you see on the status page.

To change a port, do this:
File(located at top right)>>New Port–Then, enter the correct port, and click OK aftet your done. Then, Click Login, and your there!

P.S. Might I Recommened these few servers?

  1. Thatoneserver.no-ip.org
    Port: 43594
  2. Gandteke.no-ip.biz
    Port: 43210

Or, if you fancy player killing…

  1. 68.251.253.62 (Real name is Char-scape)
    Port: 5555

or, you can enter the Thatoneserver.no-ip.org, then type in ::wildscape. That takes you to a pking part of it. Good luck, and happy Moparing!

    -Typh

Read full topic

@Tom_Manetta wrote:

you need to put in a server Ip address… look at the server page and read across the top it will say server ip:

then you put in that servers ip on the mopar page under password
